newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Jan-July home aluminium sales up 10.8 pct.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Jan-July home aluminium sales up 10.8 pct.

text.p: Brazilian internal sales of all primary aluminium reached 121,700 tonnes in the first seven months of 1997, up 10.8 percent on the 109,800 tonnes sold in January-July 1996, said the Brazilian Aluminium Association.
Sales in July reached 16,900 tonnes, down however 2.3 percent from 17,300 tonnes in July last year and also below the 17,700 tonnes sold in June 1997.
Forecasts for total 1997 sales are around of 210,000 tonnes which would be a growth of 6.9 percent on the 196,500 tonnes sold in 1996, the association said.
